items.content_html: A lightweight and extensible JavaScript API for managing client-side form validation using customizable constraint rules. Designed for dynamic web applications, it supports real-time input validation, rule chaining, error messaging, and seamless integration with modern UI frameworks.
items.title: AdeBeeY/form-constraint-validation-api: A lightweight and extensible JavaScript API for managing client-side form validation using customizable constraint rules. Designed for dynamic web applications, it supports real-time input validation, rule chaining, error messaging, and seamless integration with modern UI frameworks.

items.content_html: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests
